text: Nabiyow matablannaa! Munaafiqhiinih yan maray kitab marak ken toobokóy koroosittek: Mucammad kee kaâ luk yan mari sin buxaaxik sin yeyyeeqe kaa tekkek diggaluk nanu siinî luk awqennooh, sin saduh inkinnah num moggolla, kaadu qeebi siinit abeenik diggah nanu sin qokolenno iyyaanam, Yalli diggah usun dirableelá kinnoonumul sumaaqitah
